messages.subject: I am in need of some Unschooling support
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/3/2003 10:26:41 AM Central Daylight Time, ... Hi Kris. I run an unschooling support group waaaaaay up in Pensacola. That s really far from
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/3/2003 10:26:41 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Hi. My name is Kris and I live just outside of Key West.

Hi Kris.
I run an unschooling support group waaaaaay up in Pensacola. That's really
far from you, but I am fairly sure there are unschoolers down in your area.
As to the evals. It's mostly a formality in the younger years.
There is another option that you may be interested in, and that is an
umbrella school. The one I'm with is only $10 per year, per child and requires almost
nothing from you! It's great. You can email me if you'd like more info.
about that option.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
